Project+ USB Loader 1 \\Configurable SD/USB Loader v70r78.11 by oggzee, usptactical, gannon, Dr. Clipper, R2-D2199, FIX94, airline38, Howard, NiTRo THe DeMoN 20190331 Legacy Team \\Kirbeast, waffeln, Bird Project+ USB Loader
Project + v.51 Demo Edition. Please do not share this build without the express permission of P+ Council.
This is a modified version of CFG USB Loader designed for instantly loading Project+ with USB.
RSBE01 intro = 0 device = usb partition = auto ios = 249 video = system video_patch = all ocarina = 1 hooktype = axframe
